name: coderabbit-all
title: CodeRabbit Complete Integration
description: Complete CodeRabbit integration with all components, hooks, storage adapters, and branding. One-command installation for full-featured developer activity reporting. Includes client, React hook, form, all storage adapters (memory, localStorage, Convex), and framework-agnostic branding.
docs: Get CODERABBIT_API_KEY from https://app.coderabbit.ai/settings/api-keys (requires Pro plan). For Convex storage, import coderabbitReportsTable in convex/schema.ts and add as 'coderabbit_reports' table. See individual component docs for usage examples.
